description: This file defines a Flutter provider class 'OrdersProvider' managing a list of order objects, including methods to add orders from cart items and notify listeners.

classes.name: OrdersProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier to manage and notify changes to a list of orders.

methods.name: addOrderFromCart
methods.description: Creates a new Order object from cart items and order details, inserts it at the beginning of the orders list, and notifies listeners.
